effect.sword_shield: Transfers the user’s held item to the target. If the user has no held item, or the target already has a held item, this move will fail.

flavor_text.sword_shield: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
